reference.title: euca-delete-tags
reference.shortdesc: Deletes the specified tags from the specified resource or resources. If you specify a value for the key, the tag is deleted only if the tag's value matches the one you specified. If you specify the empty string as the value, the tag is deleted only if the tag's value is the empty string.

row.entry: ID of the resource you want to tag.
Key and optional value of the tag, separated by an equals sign (=). You can enter more than one tag to remove.
